summary: In protest of forced conversion to Islam, the Ceddo (outsiders) kidnap King Demba War's daughter Princess Dior Yacine and hold her hostage.
cast: Tabata Ndiaye|Alioune Fall|Moustapha Yade|Matoura Dia|Ismaila Diagne|Ousmane Camara|Nar Modou|Makhouredia Gueye|Mamadou Dioumé|Omar Gueye|Mamadou Sy|Mody Gueye|Samba Touré|Serigne N'Diaye|Pierre Orma|Eloi Coly|Marek Tollik|Clarice Diop|Gouré|Raymond Hermantier|Ousmane Sembene
title: Ceddo
